vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Νεφθαλείμ
(-λίμ, WH in Re, l.with), ὁ
indecl. (Heb. נַפְתָּלִי)
Naphtali: Mat.4:13, 15" (LXX) Rev.7:6.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Naphtali living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.30.8;
son of: Israel (H3478) and Bilhah (H1090A);
brother of: Dan (H1835H);
half-brother of: Reuben (H7205), Simeon (H8095), Levi (H3878), Judah (H3063), Gad (H1410), Asher (H0836), Issachar (H3485), Zebulun (H2074), Dinah (H1783), Joseph (H3130) and Benjamin (H1144);
father of: Jahzeel (H3183), Guni (H1476), Jezer (H3337) and Shillem (H8006)
§ Naphtali
Nephthalim, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 4:13, 15; Rev. 5:6*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Neftalí: (1) tribu israelita; (2) y su territorio
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿弗他利 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "扭打, 摔跤"
雅各的第六個兒子, 與拉結的使女辟拉所生的第二個兒子.
其子孫形成拿弗他利支派. (太 4:13, 4:15, 啟 7:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿弗他利这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"扭打, 摔跤"
雅各的第六个儿子, 与拉结的使女辟拉所生的第二个儿子.
其子孙形成拿弗他利支派. (太4:13, 4:15, 启7:6)
